npc_output: Hello, I'm Melanie Fisher. Isn't it a lovely foggy dawn?
I'm feeling a bit bored and tired, to be honest. This rainy midnight is quite gloomy. |r2|
Just got back from a long day of fishing. The cloudy evening is nice, though. Want to hear about my day?
Hi there! I'm Alyssa Kemp. I'm a bit bored, but I love horses. Have you ever been horsemanship?
Hey! I'm John Nelson. I need to deliver a message at dawn. It's a beautiful hot morning, isn't it? |r1|
Hey! I'm Scott Griffith. I'm excited to start farming today. This rainy weather before sunrise is perfect for it. |r1|

Hi! I'm Shawn Nelson. I'm excited to work on some new blacksmithing projects. This hot noon is perfect for it. |r1|
